title: [AIEWF Preview] Containing Agent Chaos — Solomon Hykes

rawLines.text: Hey everyone, welcome to a laten space
learning pod. This is Allesio, partner
and CTO at Desible and I'm joined by
Makos Wix, founder of Small AI. Hello.
Hello. And today I'm so happy to have
Solomon hikes join us. Solomon, you're
most famously the creator of Docker. Hi,
thanks for having me. You started Dagger
6 years ago and I think originally it
was pitched as some sort of
infrastructure provisioning thing. I I'm

introduce Dagger today? So Dagger is um
I think six Yeah, six years I guess
sounds right. Yeah. Um it's a it's a

automation tool for software teams that
want to deliver software faster and more
efficiently. And it takes all these

semi-automated with artisal scripts, you

you can drive with code, and it all runs
in containers. So, it's highly portable,
highly isolated. Uh, you can run them
locally or in CI, which saves a lot of
time. And we're an open- source

made of platform engineers. You know
those systems engineers that actually

community.
Yeah, in some ways. Uh, yeah, sorry. I
